items.sentence: I hate it when people only think of themselves.
Tom didn't know that I could understand French.
Tom carefully listened to what Mary was saying.
Tom isn't really serious about learning French.
I don't see anything wrong with Tom doing that.
We thought there wouldn't be any more problems.
Tom didn't like the sandwich Mary made for him.
The movie we saw last night had a happy ending.
Tom lives down the road from a defunct granary.
It makes more sense for you to stay than to go.
Tom was kind enough to drive me to the station.
Tom was wearing a yellow shirt with a blue tie.
Tom was annoyed because he'd been kept waiting.
Tom was hit by a car while crossing the street.
The asphalt is so hot you can fry an egg on it.
The cruise missiles were armed and ready to go.
The auctioneer spoke too fast to be understood.
Your willful disobedience is what got you here.
Tom was discharged from the hospital yesterday.
I heard that Tom and Mary have gotten divorced.
